channel.title: Aggregated Comments Feed
channel.description: Aggregated RSS feed for comments across hosting sites.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.dc:creator: Cannibal Turtle
item.description: Me too T.T If you look at the NU page for this novel there are some recs there. But honestly, most QTs adopt the same formula so you probably won't be disappointed if you browse by some popular novels for this genre. My ult fav is still Quick Transmigration System: Male God, Come Here though. It's too funny to pass, esp if you can stomach the angst endings.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.dc:creator: leyash120
item.description: I have really enjoyed reading this novel and now that it's about to end I'm feeling kind of sad. I'm wondering if the translator can recommend any novels with a similar style.
